Title: Nights of Cabiria
Writer: Federico Fellini, Ennio Flaiano (story), Tullio Pinelli (story), Pier Paolo Pasolini (collaborating writer), Brunello Rondi (writing consultant)
Actors: Giulietta Masina, François Périer, Franca Marzi, Dorian Gray
Plot: A waifish prostitute wanders the streets of Rome looking for true love but finds only heartbreak.
Production: Dino de Laurentiis Corp., Les Films Marceau
